Title: .NET DroneController
Description: The .NET DroneController makes it easy to write applications that allow you to control an ARDrone quadricopter.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The .NET DroneController makes it easy to write applications that allow you to control an ARDrone quadricopter.

Some more information: www.digitude.net/blog

The source code is created with Visual Studio 2010, the PlayGround application uses the Microsoft Expression Blend Software Development Kit (SDK) for .NET 4.

There are some restrictions on the usage of the .NET DroneController library.

Allowed:

- Using the .NET DroneController for creating applications for entertainment.

Not allowed:

- Create applications that could conflict with local law regulations
- Create applications for purposes other than entertainment, (e.g. monitoring or spy software)

As always be careful when playing around with the ARDrone.
